summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 1997 GMC SAVANNA 1500.  THE CONTACT SMELLED SUBTLE ODORS OF FUEL COMING FROM HIS VEHICLE.  HE HAS BEEN UNABLE TO PINPOINT THE EXACT LOCATION OF THE ODORS.  THE VEHICLE HAS NOT BEEN DIAGNOSED AT THIS TIME.  THE DEALER STATED THAT HIS VIN WAS NOT INCLUDED IN NHTSA CAMPAIGN ID NUMBER 00V110000 (FUEL SYSTEM, GASOLINE:DELIVERY:HOSES, LINES/PIPING, AND FITTINGS).  THE PURCHASE DATE AND POWERTRAIN WERE UNKNOWN.  THE CURRENT MILEAGE WAS 60,000 AND FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 50,000.
